document.docAuthor: Simaiakis, Stylianos Michail, Akkari, Nesrine & Zapparoli, Marzio
document.masterDocTitle: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The centipedes of Peloponnisos and first records of genus Eurygeophilus in the East Mediterranean (Myriapoda: Chilopoda)

L. pusillus
var. obscuriceps Verhoeff
, 190 l: 451 .

( 3 ) L . [
Lithonannus

pusillus

General distribution. Europe: Albania , Austria , Belgium , Bosnia Herzegovina , Croatia , Czech Republic , Denmark , France (incl. Corsica ), Germany , Great Britain , Greece (incl. Ionian Is.), Hungary , Ireland , Italy (incl. Sardinia and Sicily), Moldova , Montenegro , Netherlands , Poland , Romania , Slovakia , Slovenia , Spain (incl. Canary Is.), Sweden , Switzerland , Ukraine (
Zapparoli 2002
; Minelli et al. 2006 ).

Records in Peloponnisos (
Fig. 4
). Ahaia: Patra (loc. typ. of
Lithobius pusillus
var. obscuriceps
Verhoeff, 1901
) (2, 3, 5, 7). Argolida: Nafplio (1, 4, 7 ). Arkadia: 1 km E Vitina, crossroads to Vitina, 1025 m ( 7 ). Lakonia: Taigetos, near 1800–2200 m (6, 7).

New records from Mt. Parnonas (
Fig. 4
). 2 exx., Arkadia, Moni Kontolinas, spruce forest (loc. 4 ), 985 m ,
N 37.241979
/
E 22.658707
,
26 Oct. 2014
; 12 exx., Arkadia, Meligarias south of Oreini Meligou (loc. 9 ), 810 m ,
N 37.350434
/
E 22.671654
,
27 Oct. 2014
; 3 exx., Arkadia, Xirokampi 1.2 km north, west of Agios Ioannis (loc. 10 ), 870 m ,
N 37.349902
/
E 22.593355
,
27 Oct. 2014
; 16 exx., Arkadia, Xirolakki, east of Prastos (loc. 14 ), 585 m ,

Ecological notes. 110–2200 m ; an euriecious species, recorded under
Genista
sp., in thermophilous Mediterranean habitats, in thermomesophilous broadleaved forests, in riparian woods, in
Abies cephalonica
and
Fagus sylvatica
forests, in caves, and in agroecosystems ( Zapparoli 1994 , 1996 ,
2002
).
